arguments.name: Trials
arguments.description: The number of independent trials. Must be greater than or equal to 0.

arguments.name: Probability_s
arguments.description: The probability of success in each trial. Must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 1.

arguments.name: Number_s
arguments.description: The number of successes in trials. Must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to Trials.

arguments.name: Number_s2
arguments.description: If provided, returns the probability that the number of successful trials will fall between Number_s and number_s2. Must be greater than or equal to Number_s and less than or equal to Trials.
